price: 62. Tal es el proceder de Al-lah con (los incrédulos) que los precedieron; y no encontrarás cambios en la manera de actuar de Al-lah.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi fī alladhīna khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
